title: Don't Press Play - Homemade Slideshow - Trippy Artwork pu
description:
Don&#039;t Press Play is a DVD Slideshow chock full of very trippy artwork put to a nice selection of indie bands including: The Unicorns, Midlake, Flaming Lips, Nine Inch Nails, Radiohead, Band of Horses, Menomena, etc... Good suppliment for an acid or mushroom trip. or just good to have on in the background at parties. i made this DVD about a year ago and it&#039;s put itself to good use. i figure it&#039;s about time to share it.

This torrent is in DVD format, was created with Nero Vision, can be burnt with Nero Recode. Runtime is over 3 hours long, with over 1000 still images that if in the right frame of mind you WILL wonder if they are moving. the music selection is of my own design. i guarantee you will enjoy this. 10 different menu selections so you don&#039;t have to start from the beginning each time.

I&#039;m also bundling my album into this torrent. The album is called Welcome to the Afterlife by my project called Secretly Plotting Your Burial. We&#039;re a two-piece acoustic project. very dark. If you have the capabilities of excluding files in a torrent, please don&#039;t exclude the album. This is my way of self-promoting.

if you like anything you get here, please don&#039;t hesitate to let me know.

the band&#039;s myspace is

enjoy.
-Jake.
